snippet.title: Train Sim World - Coming Soon to Consoles and PC!
snippet.description:
For more information visit https://trainsimworld.com

We're very happy to announce that Train Sim World will be coming to both PS4 and Xbox One  on July 24th, 2018!

We'll be bringing content from the Great Western Express, Rapid Transit and NEC: New York packs to your favourite console. The Digital Deluxe also includes the GP40-2!

The PC versions along with CSX: Heavy Haul will also be bundled into a new package which will act as the base game for loads of amazing new content - with a special upgrade deal for those who don't own the full set!

We hope you're excited!
